Lovely blog you have.

comments.content:
Sounds delicious.  Oregon white truffles are just coming into season right now.  Free for anyone with a connection to a Christmas tree farmer.  I'm spoiled, as I forage mine for free...

The most wonderful things this side of aged Parmesano Reggiano...
